    • Method Detail

      • install

        public static boolean install(android.content.Context context,
                              java.io.File apk)
        Installs an APK in ATAK.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use for the install process
        apk - the apk pointed to by the file.
        Returns:
        true if the process was kicked off with sucess. Does not indicate if the app was installed correctly.

      • getAppNameOrPackage

        public static java.lang.String getAppNameOrPackage(android.content.Context context,
                                                   java.lang.String packageName)
        Given a packageName return the application name
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use
        packageName - the package name
        Returns:
        the name of the app or if the app is not found, the package name provided is returned.

      • getAppDrawable

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getAppDrawable(android.content.Context context,
                                                                java.lang.String packageName)
        Get the drawable for the apk.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use
        packageName - the package name
        Returns:
        null if the packageName does not resolve to an installed application.

      • getDialogIcon

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getDialogIcon(android.content.Context context,
                                                               android.graphics.drawable.Drawable image,
                                                               float size)
        Scale image to a specified size Used to display alert dialog icons at a reasonable, consistent size.
        Parameters:
        image - Drawable
        size - Desired size in pixels It's recommended to pass in a dimension resource here rather than a hardcoded size
        Returns:
        Scaled drawable

      • getDialogIcon

        public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getDialogIcon(android.content.Context context,
                                                               android.graphics.drawable.Drawable image)
        Given a drawable, get a scaled drawable useful for the dialog box
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use
        image - the original drawable
        Returns:
        a 32dp icon useful for a dialog box icon.

      • getDialogIcon

        @Deprecated
public static android.graphics.drawable.Drawable getDialogIcon(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable image,
                                                                           float size)
        Deprecated. Use getDialogIcon(Context, Drawable, float)
        Scale image to a specified size - only works for bitmap drawables Used to display alert dialog icons at a reasonable, consistent size.
        Parameters:
        image - Bitmap drawable
        size - Desired size in pixels It's recommended to pass in a dimension resource here rather than a hardcoded size
        Returns:
        Scaled drawable

                                                            java.lang.String packageName)

        Parameters:
        context - the context to use
        packageName - the package name to resolve
        Returns:
        null if the application is not found otherwise the application information

        Parameters:

        pkg - the package name to resolve

      • isInstalled

        public static boolean isInstalled(android.content.Context context,
                                  java.lang.String pkg)
        Checks is the package name is registered in the device package manager ie installed apk
        Parameters:
        context - the context to use
        pkg - the manifest package name that is associated with the application
        Returns:
        true if the application described by the package name is installed.

        Parameters:

        pkgname - the package name to resolve
        Returns:
